name: Tourister Bus driver 3D Parking: hill city
name_original: Tourister Bus driver 3D Parking: hill city
description:
Tourister Bus 3D Parking

Bus 3D Parking is a bus simulator with realistic controls and great dynamic gameplay.
Do you like to drive something bigger? Car parking is easy, try the big bus parking. Smooth controls, realistic vehicle physics and challenging parking missions.
Good graphics, optimized to run smooth on all devices, crazy challenging levels and a lot of fun awaits you with Bus Parking 2015 in full nice 3D.
Control your car with an on-screen steering wheel, acceleration and brake pedals. Shift the gear to forward or backward as you need.
Rate game if you like it, and we hope you enjoy your casual time with this 3D game.In this game has everything a bus parking needs to have!

key features:

- Realistic Bus driving experience
- Perfect HD graphics
- different situations of Parking with your bus
- More levels are coming.
